about_the_game:
ADVENTURE AWAITS

Dive into the extraordinary world of "Clayverse." You find yourself stranded in a multiverse of clay and must embark on an epic quest to find your way back home.

SHAPE YOUR DESTINY

Begin your epic journey by creating your very own hero. Mold and customize your character, crafting a unique adventurer with distinct abilities. As you venture deeper into the clay-infused multiverse, unlock new classes and expand your repertoire of skills. Your mission? To return to your own world and shape the destiny of your clay hero.

CRAFTING WITH CLAY

The heart of "Clayverse" beats in its crafting. Explore a kaleidoscope of clay-rich alien planets, each offering a unique blend of materials. Collect rare resources and master the art of crafting, breathing life into new items, tools, and artifacts. Experiment with combinations to forge the perfect gear, redefining your journey and leading you closer to home.

EXPLORE THE MULTIVERSE

Traverse a mesmerizing multiverse where every inch of the landscape is a masterpiece of clay artistry. Uncover secrets hidden within weird sculptures, all while marveling at the artistry around you. As you inch closer to unraveling the mystery of your existence, you find your way back home in the enchanting multiverse.

TACTICAL CLAY COMBAT

Surviving in the Clayverse demands finesse and cooperation, rather than brute strength. Engage in tactical combat, featuring a tab targeting combat system inspired by classic MMOs like World of Warcraft. Your choice of equipment is critical, and timing your skills is paramount. Join forces with fellow travelers to overcome intricate puzzles and challenges standing in your way.

GORY CLAYMATION: TWISTED DELIGHTS IN CLAYVERSE

"Clayverse" presents a darkly humorous twist with gory claymation. Here, clay puppets face comically gruesome mishaps, adding an unexpected thrill to your adventure. Embrace the brutality for a one-of-a-kind and exhilarating gaming adventure.
